text: Bangor is a city in County Down, Northern Ireland. == Population facts == On 29 April 2001 the United Kingdom government had a census and saw that there were 58,388 people living in Bangor. They also saw that: * 20.2% of people in Bangor were under 16 years old and 20.3% were over 60 years old * 47.7% of people were male and 52.3% were female * 82.7% were from a Protestant background and 10.6% were from a Roman Catholic background == References == Category:Towns in County Down
title: Bangor, County Down
